definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Strictly, the term flagella should be used only in relation to bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格來說，“鞭毛”應該僅用於描述細菌的結構。

sentences.english: However, the two sets of numbers are not strictly comparable.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這兩個數字嚴格來說並不具有可比性。
但嚴格來說這確實只是個玩笑。

sentences.english: Technically, I'm not supposed to do this, but we're shot-staffed.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格來說，我不該這麼做，可是我們缺少人手。

sentences.english: And technically, you asked me out.
sentences.chinese: 而且嚴格來說，是你約我出來的。

sentences.english: Heated water turning to gas is one such behavior, known technically as a phase transition.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，熱水轉換成氣體嚴格來說是一種相變過程。

sentences.english: O.K., strictly speaking it’s long past.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，嚴格來說，在很久以前就應該行動了。
